question: In which of the following countries, the World’s first photovoltaic highway has been constructed?
explanation: World’s first photovoltaic highway has been constructed in China. The special section of Jinan’s southern ring road, two kilometres long, is the first photovoltaic highway in the world. Several photovoltaic devices have been installed on a ring road in Jinan, in the eastern Chinese province of Shandong, to construct a solar-powered system for charging poles.
